data.title: A Good, Dependable, Lunch or Dinner Choice
data.text: This is a nice spot for a casual lunch or dinner. They serve good salads and pasta dishes. Wood grilled salmon is my favorite entrée. Service is always good and the place is spotless. Outside seating is available but there is a little traffic noise to deal with. Overall a good choice for a casual meal.

data.title: Good Food, Good Service
data.text: A great place for a nice meal.  The menu selections are simple and good; appetizers, pastas, fish, really tasty salads, and a few meat/chicken selections.  The specials which vary can be very tempting so be sure to ask if they are not offered to you.  Though not particularly formal, this restaurant is perfect for a special meal.  Outside street seating is also available for those temperate evenings.

data.title: Good food but noisy
data.text: Strizzi's offers good food at reasonable prices.  Outdoor seating is available.  Full menu, good service, clean.  My only complaint is that it is VERY noisy with nothing to soften the volume when the restaurant is even half full.

data.title: Decent but not much beyond Meh...
data.text:
No reservations on Saturday evening, got there and we were greeted and seated fairly quickly.   All good so far.   Prompt and friendly service.   Wine list is "in transition" which means that pretty much all of the reasonably price wines by the glass are unavailable.   Good news is that the local brews on tap are a good option.

House salad or house Caesar both good choices and good value.   Entree salad with chicken was funny because it was a house salad with chicken breast slapped on top for $12 added cost.   Ok whatever tasted good so no big deal.   Chicken risotto was fine but pretty uninspired - by no means bad or badly cooked, just really not memorable.

Overall a decent experience.   Ok if downtown and looking for an easy spot,but I think there are many other options to consider.

data.title: Poor service
data.text: I had lunch here and was waiting for my friend to arrive. The restaurant was not busy but yet I had to ask for service. When I arrived I was told I could sit anywhere by a server who yelled this to me from the other end of the restaurant. When a server finally came, I order a glass of wine and was told they no longer carried it. The food was good but lukewarm and when it came time to pay the bill, I had to take the bill to someone. Very disappointed with the service but the food was good. I do not plan to go there again.

data.title: A great breakfast on a Sunday after church!
data.text: My wife and I went out to celebrate!  We chose Strizzi's as it was a beautiful  morning and we were hoping to sit outside. We had a fantastic breakfast! The Bloody Mary's were exceptional, the food was delicious, the service was excellent, and the price was reasonable. This may be our new "go to" place for Sunday's after church!

data.title: Average meal
data.text: We ate outside on the patio. Service was fine, cost was a little high and salmon was average. Really nothing special although the menu sounded really good.

user_location.name: Los Ranchos de Albuquerque, New Mexico

data.title: Great combo dinners
data.text: This is a great place to eat with outdoor seating for when the weather is nice. They have a good selection of wine as well as their own brand label of whites and reds. The nice thing about their menu is that it includes a choice of several salads or soup plus a good selection of their house specialities in half sized portions.

data.title: Favorite downtown Italian style restaurant.
data.text: Great for weekend brunch, lunch, and dinner. We also order takeout frequently. Their smaller portions and early bird specials are real bargains.

data.title: Great value, nice menu
data.text: Strizzi's has an early bird menu where you get a soup or salad included with certain entrees before 6 PM, a great deal. Liked the pasta dishes, very large portions. One of the best things - can bring your own wine, with no - zero - corkage fee! Attentive service, nice atmosphere.

data.title: Good food but a little noisy sometimes
data.text: The food is good, and on nice evenings, sitting outside is fantastic. Right in the hub of downtown. People watching at its finest! Can be a little noisy inside sometimes, but better than the Pleasanton location noise-wise. Nice place for lunch, their specials are filling and well-priced.

data.title: A Livermore Favorite
data.text: Strizzi's has been our favorite Livermore restaurant for many years. The food is wonderful, the atmosphere fun and noisy, and the service excellent. Try the Copper River Salmon or jalapeño ravioli (seasonal) or any of the regular menu item. The calamari is excellent and our favorite appetizer! There is no corkage when you bring a bottle of wine. Ask for Juan if he is working as he is their best waiter.

data.title: Great Italian at a reasonable price
data.text: We eat here several times a year and are always happy with the food and the staff. Keep up the great work!

data.title: Convenient place to eat.
data.text: Not a fancy restaurant but popular with a lot of people for its convenient location to the theater and downtown shopping.  Our friends liked their food but unfortunately I could not say the same.  Dressing on my dinner salad was way too much and spoiled the salad.  I probably will go back one more time to see if I like it better.  Not real family orientated because of the table sizes.  Very friendly staff!  They get five stars.

data.title: Great for weekend brunch
data.text: Sister restaurant to Strizzi's in Pleasanton.  Usually go for Brunch on Sunday's and sit on the patio with our dog.

data.title: Italian
data.text: Very good Italian food.  Selection great.   Consistent with good food and service.  Outdoor seating nice but close to foot traffic

data.title: Dinner night!
data.text: Eaten here several times and is always a great evening out! Food was great, service was excellent and location was good!

data.title: Excellent food!
data.text: Great place to stop in Livermore. Fresh fish good pasta & excellent salads!love the Almond Trout & the Asiago Ravioli. good portions and you can also get a half dish & salad when you want to eat light.

data.title: Great lunch stop
data.text: Stopped here for lunch and the service was good.  I sat outside since the weather was nice and had a large salad which was tasty.  The chicken on the salad was delicious and I noticed they used wood to grill their food.  I would gladly return here again in the future.

data.title: Great Italian sining
data.text: Strizzi's has been my favorite Italian restaurant in Livermore since it opened. Food is delicious, service is always great and outdoor dining makes it a lovely experience!
